content: There was a swirling mass of water that lived in a quiet pond. It asked permission from its master, to visit the lands beyond. And its master allowed it to fly. So the wind swept the whirlpool across the sky. The whirlpool's mother wore a jacket she'd sewn out of dental floss. It was stolen by a monkey, that sold it to an albatross. And it had the idea to fly. So the wind swept the whirlpool across the sky.
author: The Meat Puppets
